name: Selman Ercan's GitHub projects
body:
### Projects: * [GA](https://github.com/S-Ercan/GA)
Applying genetic programming to optimization problems.
Currently contains a standard genetic algorithm implementation for the _MAX-3SAT_ problem. * [QLearning](https://github.com/S-Ercan/QLearning)
Reinforcement learning agent learning to navigate a maze containing rewards and punishments using the Q-learning technique.
Based on the section about Q-learning in the Reinforcement Learning chapter of _Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach_. * [dota2-deathmap](https://github.com/S-Ercan/dota2-deathmap)
Interactive D3 visualizations for a generated DotA 2 death map.
Visualizes player deaths using a game map overlaid by a generated scatter plot. * [PhiVis](https://github.com/S-Ercan/PhiVis)
Interactive D3 visualizations for the PHI-base data set.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
